description: Use AI to generate conventional commit messages that meet the conventions
config.title: AI Commit
config.language.markdown: Sets the language used for AI-generated commit messages. The same value replaces {{LANG}} inside prompt templates so guidance and bodies stay localized.
config.activeProviderId.description: Which provider to use from ai-commit.providers
config.promptFlavor.description: Which prompt template to use from the bundled prompt directory
config.promptFlavor.conventionalWithGitm: Conventional commits with gitmoji emoji prefix
config.promptFlavor.markdown: Switch between the default Conventional Commit prompt and the Gitmoji-enhanced variant. Both prompts still honor the selected commit language.
config.promptFile.description: Absolute path to a custom prompt file; if set, overrides flavor and directory
config.promptFile.markdown: Provide an absolute path to your own prompt. When specified it replaces the bundled templates, so ensure it still enforces Conventional Commits and references {{LANG}} for localization.
